description: Try this easy recipe for zingy chimichurri sauce that's perfect for drizzling on barbecued steak, fish or prawns.
keywords: Salsa verde,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Video,Low sugar,Sesame free,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chimichurri Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup continental parsley leaves, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Combine vinegar, oregano and chilli in a small bowl. Stand for 5 minutes. Add parsley, garlic and oil. Stir until well combined. Season and serve.
